content: such a cute little baby cardigan jacket with a sweet cabled front gender neutral too easy & quick to knit requires ~ dk 8ply yarn around 65g for the smaller size dk 8ply yarn around 100g for the bigger size 4mm needles 6 buttons sizes ~ 0 - 3 months 6 - 12 months **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
